author: newsr.in
title: France somehow rejects Google’s appeal, setting dangerous ‘right to be forgotten’ globally - newsR
text: The argument between Google and France over whether the search giant should have to remove sensitive links from just google.fr or from all Google sites worldwide continues, as the French privacy watchdog CNIL has rejected the company’s appeal. The story so far: Europe introduced ‘right to be forgotten‘ legislation stating that individuals have the right […] »
